resources.string: The remaining balance cannot be greater than the initial balance
The current date is outside the date range
The end date must be after the start date plus the days off
The total days off must be entered with the past days off
The past days off cannot be more than the total days off
The values are not being saved

Toolbar buttons:

• The pawprint button opens Tigerbucks (may need a refresh to load content)
• The 'e' button opens eServices

User fields:

• Rollover: How much you are rolling over from a previous semester
• Remaining balance: How much you have now
• Click on the meal plan and term drop-downs to change them
• Click on the dates to change them
• Total days off: The total number of days off in the date range
• Past days off: The number of days off that have already past
Results fields:\n\n• Difference: The difference between your current balance and the expected balance based on your initial daily limit and the number of days past
RIT Debit Splitter by Alderfer Studios
This app is open source. You can find it here: https://github.com/BenAlderfer/RIT-Debit-Splitter

If you would like to translate this app, please email alderferstudios@gmail.com with your request and I will send you instructions.\nIf you already know how to do this, you can edit the strings.xml (\\app\\src\\main\\res\\values) file in the source and send it to the above email.

If you have any questions, bug reports, or suggestions, contact: alderferstudios@gmail.com

Please include your device and version of Android with any bug reports

If you run into an error while using the app, please tap "Report" to send the error message to me

If you would like to show your appreciation, here's how:

• Donate to a charity - they probably need it more than me
• Paypal or Venmo: benalderfer974@gmail.com
